purpose: Backs up (gzips) certain directories. If no directories are given, then the script will backup the following directories:\n\n

args.name: archive
args.description: The file to create and gzip the directories into

args.name: directory
args.description: A directory to add to the archive

args.name: directories...
args.description: More directories to add to the archive

args.name: restore
args.description: Whether to restore the files instead of back them up (not currently functionng)

exit_codes.1: If a backup location was not specified

examples.purpose: Backup the default list of directories to a file called "backup.tar.gz"
Backup the directories "dir1", "dir2", and "dir3" to a file called "backup.tar.gz"
